fhso.enableHotSeatObserver.name: Enable Hot Seat Module
fhso.enableHotSeatObserver.hint: Activates or deactivates all features of Module
fhso.toggleGMSelect.name: Toggle GM Select Mode
fhso.toggleGMSelect.hint: Allows GM to select the active token for the hot seat player
fhso.hotSeatPlayerName.name: Hot Seat Player Name
fhso.hotSeatPlayerName.hint: Overrides player name used for hotseat functionality
fhso.cameraMoveOnInitiative.name: Camera Tracks Initiative
fhso.cameraMoveOnInitiative.hint: Allows camera to center on next player token on initiative change
